Mod.name: Chemical Curiosities
Mod.description:
Welcome to Squirrelly's Chemical Curiosities, a massive expansion of the alchemy system, and also a sort of sequel/remastering of Evaisa's Arcane Alchemy!!
Note: Arcane Alchemy is not compatible, because all of that code is pretty much there already.
Comes packed with 80+ materials, 200+ reactions, alchemy-related spells, items, and even an entire ore-generation system!!
A few of the (very) many things added:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/HDKSJPL.gif[/img] A localized fungal shift spell!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pIqRqqZ.gif[/img] Slicing Liquid, to make the living things stop
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Vicf4jX.gif[/img] you can spread this stuff!!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/qF6x4v5.gif[/img] New gas canisters???
[img]https://i.imgur.com/KlvpM6P.gif[/img] drink potions!!?!?
[img]https://i.imgur.com/eDWatTX.gif[/img] grow crystals!!?!!?
[img]https://i.imgur.com/kBlIBG0.gif[/img] perform alchemy in a safe environment!
Big thanks to copi for some sprite work, Evaisa for allowing me to put arcane alchemy inside this mod, my playtesters for playtesting, and many more!
